channel.title: **My new server MimzScape**
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b] MimzScape[/b][/size]
[b]Hey, wassup? Well I just wanted to tell you that I was making my new server (actually it's my first one, but still...) and that even though it's my first server to be released on Moparscape and anywhere, that you will not be dissapointed (hopefully) and in fact it is going to be a very nice server... [/b]
[i]My new server will include the following...[/i]
[i][b] (New Features) -New Home area (Falador) -New Clan Wars -New Quests (They will be full) -Clue Scrolls (With full adventures and different levels just like real Runescape) -All Guilds (A Guild for every skill) -New Barrows Minigame -New Staff Zone -New Summoning skill (Like real Runescape, only a tad bit different) -New Construction skill -New Hunter skill (Like real Runescape -New Staff "Mansion" -New Server Update Center (The SUC... Lol, read below for information on what this is)
(Updated Features) -Fixing Beard Glitch -Fixing Glitches with walls and doors -Making ALL doors openable -Making ALL Npcs talk (Not shout) -Making ALL Shops in different areas (Like in their "correct" place) -Making Range Projectiles -Making Magic work correctly -Making ALL signs work -Making attackable Npcs have correct health -Making attackable Npcs harder (Like real Runescape) -Making Pking a little bit harder -Adding Bank Pking -Adding Safety areas (In lower Wilderness levels for the noobs) -Adding Wilderness levels (Like real Runescape) -Fixed food timers -Making teleportation animations correct and "perfect"
(Some Server Info) -My new server will be more "Organized" in the way that the objects are set up, and it wont be a huge pile of crap in one area and it look like shit, My server will be somewhat sceneic and "nice" -My server will be Player Friendly, in other words I will do my best to make it easy for the Owner/Administrators to talk to the players and update them on whats going on with the server update center, the "SUC" is a place with an Npc that gives server update information to anyone that wants to know and it has message boards so that people can read the message boards for information on what's new (all of this will be done via command, such as ::update "the update here" and that will update the Npc who tells people whats going on, and then there will be ::boardupdate "what you want the message board to say") -My server will also be Noob Friendly, with a very discriptive ::help command that basically tells them everything about the server... -I will also do my best to make my server "harder" in the sense that leveling up will be "easy" but not too easy... there will be NO object training, you MUST train on Npc's only... -My server will be fun to play and even more fun to code later on, however most of you will not want to code it unless you want to use it as an AMS (already made source) or you just want to add your own stuff to it... -My server will be pretty close to real Runescape with the glitches being fixed and the quests and clue scrolls being outragously accurate and the fact that the Npc's are very much like real Runescape... [/b] [/i]
[size=20pt][b] Well I hope you are interested in seeing the finished product, I will post this topic again or probably just update the thread with new pictures on what I've accomplished so far...[/b][/size] [size=15pt][b][u]***Also if you were interested and you want to help me just PM me and I'll talk to you... Thanks***[/u][/b][/size]
-00ryn00 (Mimz)
[sup]**This server is not leached nor (when I release it) do I want it to be leached, so if you do, at least give me credits, and I'll laugh at you if you say this is the wrong section**[/sup]

item.title: **My new server MimzScape**
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

cocoa:

you can’t do projects unless you have permission from a mod.

What the fuck do you mean by that?

[quote=“veikron, post:13, topic:229156”]well if ur asking do i know how to open client.java find makeglobal object something like that copy a bank or something press enter paste change the cords and id number yea of course thats easy

you can’t do projects unless you have permission from a mod.

it sais server not project[/quote]

lol yeah I know thats easy… but then once you learn that, you can then make your own minigames, and once you know how to make a minigame you can then make quests, then you can make more advanced quests, and then you can make clue scrolls, and then you can do a whole bunch of other cool shit, then you can learn how to make your source more stable, how to make it hold more players, and how to edit the client and make your server run with only the client and then go from there

Read full topic

item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

lol yeah but do you know how to add objects and stuff? (I do I’m not asking for help or anything)
because thats another crucial thing, but that also plays a pretty big role with public ints and other stuff…
and yeah drops are really easy to edit (just go to drops.cfg)
but it’s not that hard to learn the basics, and once you learn the basics you can then go from there…

Read full topic

item.description:
@veikron wrote:

ya when i was 12.6453 i played a private server and buy 13.247 i stuck with one and a year later the owner got gay scammed my rs acount and i quit his server i was bored so i tried makeing my own i got adding commands down adding npcs and editing shops stats drops etc dunno bout booleans gota learn that and gota try to learn c++ some how
just kidding bout the age decimals

Read full topic

item.title: **My new server MimzScape**
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

lol like me? apparently you and me have more in comon than you (or I) thought, except for the whole learned java programming in two weeks thing… but yeah I’m also 14, however I learned (and practiced) C++ programming when I was around 12.5 to 13 years old and I started coding stuff like RS Private servers at the age of 13.4 lol (I don’t know whats up with the decimals…) anyway, yeah pretty much to get better you just have to practice at it, like start making commands to learn how the whole thing is laid out, then learn about
booleans
ints
doubles (This is mainly in C++ however)
all of the statements such as If - Then, If - Else (Most Common in coding moparscape), and Try - Exception, and a whole bunch of other ones…
but once you get it down… it’s not really that hard

Read full topic
